# Summary

Describe what this PR changes and why.

# Type of Change

- [ ] feat: new feature
- [ ] fix: bug fix
- [ ] docs: documentation only
- [ ] chore/ci: tooling or infrastructure
- [ ] refactor/perf: code change without behavior change

# Checklist

- [ ] Conventional Commit in title (e.g., "feat: add X", "fix: Y")
- [ ] Added a changeset (.changeset/*.md) if code behavior changes
- [ ] Updated docs or examples if needed
- [ ] CI passes (PR checks)

# Env / Security

Does this change require new env vars or secrets? If yes, list server-only vs. public.
